hero.title: Optimal Irrigation for Your Garden
hero.motto: We don’t just optimize irrigation – we improve the living conditions of your plants.
hero.subline: Because sustainability doesn’t mean saving – it means making conscious choices.

postHero: Your Specialist for Irrigation Systems and Garden Technology in Vienna and Lower Austria

service1.title: Planning and Installation of Irrigation Systems
service1.desc: We plan and install automated irrigation systems for private gardens. The system consists of underground piping, water-saving sprinkler heads, and zone-based control. During installation, we take special care not to damage the lawn and to preserve the garden's appearance.

service2.title: Maintenance and Repair of Systems
service2.desc: We ensure your system runs smoothly all year round: spring start-up, autumn drainage, adjustment or replacement of sprinklers, leak repair, and inspection and updating of controllers. Even if your system was not installed by us, we’re happy to help.

service3.title: General Garden Maintenance
service3.desc: A beautiful garden needs regular care. We offer lawn mowing, edge trimming, weed removal, pruning of shrubs and hedges, and disposal of green waste. On request, we can also take care of one-time or seasonal garden work.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: We are garden and irrigation experts specializing in smart and sustainable solutions for your green outdoor space.

offerFreeSurvey.title: Free On-Site Consultation
offerFreeSurvey.desc: Send us an email to request a non-binding on-site visit – we’ll get back to you within 24 hours with a tailored offer.

inhouseTech.title: Our Own Smart Systems
inhouseTech.desc: We develop and install fully automatic, sustainable irrigation systems – perfectly compatible with brands like Hunter or Rain Bird, but with our own smart controller. Our goal: optimal plant care with minimal water usage.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us?
points: Grass remains intact – we discreetly install everything below the surface.
Tailored planning for your garden – whether new construction or retrofit.
Autumn & spring service: We reliably start up and drain your system.
Transparency & reliability – you always know what’s happening and receive long-term support.

callToAction.text: Start your worry-free gardening season now – contact us for your free consultation!

packages.title: Our Service Packages
packages.desc: From simple system maintenance to comprehensive garden care – choose the package that best suits your needs.

basic.title: Basic Package
basic.desc: System check, spring start-up or autumn draining, sprinkler adjustment, and basic consultation.

comfort.title: Comfort Package
comfort.desc: All services from the Basic Package + lawn care, hedge trimming, and weed removal – ideal for well-maintained gardens.

premium.title: Premium Package
premium.desc: All-round service: spring and autumn care, system optimization, regular maintenance, and holiday replacement – everything from a single source.

spring.title: Spring Start Package
spring.desc: Season opening with system start-up, hedge pruning, and targeted weed removal – everything for a healthy start to the gardening year.

care.title: All-round Garden Care
care.desc: Weekly maintenance (2–4 hrs): mowing, trimming, cleaning – ideal for long-term support without effort.

vacation.title: Cleanup & Fresh Start
vacation.desc: We take care of cleaning up and restoring neglected gardens and yards – laying the foundation for a fresh start, so you don’t have to handle the toughest and least enjoyable tasks.

audience.title: Who are our services for?
audience.residential: Private households with a garden or second residence who need professional support for lawn mowing, hedge trimming, weeding, and automated irrigation – from installation and seasonal maintenance to system optimization. Especially attractive for customers in 1130 Vienna – Hietzing: no travel surcharge.
audience.sharedYards: Residential communities or homeowner associations with shared green areas that require regular care and reliable irrigation. We also inspect and upgrade outdated or underperforming irrigation systems to improve water efficiency and plant health.
audience.publicSpaces: Municipalities, schools, daycare centers or businesses looking to keep their green spaces functional and attractive – including professional garden maintenance and the installation or modernization of water-saving irrigation systems with year-round service.
